segments.text: I notice the woman is really focused on that plate she's drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't even looked up once to see what's going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water's been overflowing for a while now, and she hasn't done anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she must be really tired or something, to not notice all this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, trying to get as many cookies as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's not even looking where he's standing, that stool is so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting there, like it's completely normal to be taking cookies like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've ever been caught doing this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman must have a lot on her mind, to not notice any of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should help her out, but I don't know how without causing a scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
